channel.title: Mosab Abu Toha on
channel.description: Recent content in Mosab Abu Toha on

item.title: Forest of Noise
item.description: How do you write the unimaginable? How do you craft art from the horror? How do you count your loved ones, now dead, in lines of poems? I read this twice, once fast, once slow, and let it break me. 50 years of occupation and apartheid.
